definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]

sentences.english: And behold WuShanShan understand and sympathize with local guide to support his side in m.
sentences.chinese: 不料吴珊珊了解并体恤地陪在徐峰身边给他支持。

sentences.english: What does the following work contain after the tour group packing off?
sentences.chinese: 第十四题下团后地陪的后续工作有哪些？

sentences.english: Your mother would smile awkwardly, desperate enough to take this as a compliment.
sentences.chinese: 你母亲笨拙地陪笑，竭尽全力把这话当成是一种恭维。

sentences.english: How to recognize the tour groups as a local guide ?
sentences.chinese: 作为地陪应如何认找旅游团？

sentences.english: From which aspects should a local guide get to know the traffic bill?
sentences.chinese: 地陪应从哪几方面掌握交通票据的情况？

sentences.english: To love is to dream together.
sentences.chinese: 爱就是安静地陪着你梦想。

sentences.english: From which aspects should a local guide know about the transporting bills?
sentences.chinese: 地陪应从哪几方面掌握交通票据的情况？

sentences.english: In a few minutes he was on his rapid way to the Stone-pits by the side of Dolly .
sentences.chinese: 几分钟后，他已经急忙忙地陪着多丽赶到石坑去了。

definition: to follow sb closely (idiom)/to keep close to

pinyin: you3 yi1 da1 mei2 yi1 da1

definition: to act as host/to do the honors
see 悠哉悠哉[you1 zai1 you1 zai1]
